sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>boat</radical> has <radical>fins</radical> and a <radical>mouth</radical>! It's still a <kanji>boat</kanji> though.
meaningInfo: Picture this boat. It's still a boat, but there is a big mouth on the front and it has fins that it paddles forward with.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>boat</kanji> belongs to the <reading>cen</reading>taurs (<ja>せん</ja>). That's probably why you've never seen a boat like it before.
readingInfo: Picture this mouth and boat with a bunch of centaurs riding in it. Centaurs have a lot more parts than humans, so it makes sense that their boats have more parts (animal ones) too.
